maqras.text: Apney buhat hi buland Allah kay nam ki pakizgi biyan ker
Jissney paida kiya aur sahi salim banaya
Aur jiss na(thek thak)andaza kiya aur phir rah dekhai
Aur jis nay taza ghass paida ki
Phir ussney is ko (sukha ker )siyah kora ker diya
Hum tujhy parhaein gay phir tu na bhoolay ga
Magar jo kuch Allah chahey wo zahir aur poshida ko janta hay
Hum apky liey asani paida kerdein gay
To ap nasehat kerty rahein ager nasehat kuch faida dy
Derney wala to nasehat lyga
(han)badbakht is say gurez karey ga
Jo bari aag mein jaey ga
Jahan phir won a mary ga jnajeiy ga(balky halat e nazah mein para rahy ga)
Besahk usney falah pali jo pak hogaya
Aur jis nay apney rab ka nam yad rakha aur namaz parhta raha
Lakin tum to duniya ki zindagi ko tarjeeh dyty ho
Aur akhrat buhat bhyter aur baqa wali hay
Yeh batein phyli kitabon mein bhi hein
(yani) Ibrahim aur Musa ki kitabon mein
Kiya tujhy bhi chopa lyney wali(qiyamat) ki khabar phunchi hay
Us din bohat say chehry zalil hongy
(aur) mehnat kerney walay thakay huye hongay
Woh dehakti hoi aag mein jaein gy
Aur nihayat garm chasmy ka pani unko pilaya jaey ga
in kay liey siway-e-kanty dar darkhton kay aur kuch khana na hoga
Jo na mota karey ga na bhook mitaey ga
Buhat say chehry usdin tar o taza aur(asoda hall) hongy
Apni koshish per khush hongy
Buland o bala janaton mein hongay
Jahan koi byhoda bat nahi sunein gaein
Jahan bhyta hoa chashma hoga
(Aur) us mein onchy onchy takht hongy
Aur aabkhory rakhy hoy(hongy)
Aur ik qatar mein lagy hoy takiey hongy
Aur makhmali masnadein pheli pari hongi
Kiya yeh onton ko nahi dekhty kay wok is tarah paida kiey gay hein
Aur asmano ko kay kis tarah oncha kiya gaya hay
Aur paharon ki tarf kay kis tarah gar dey gay hein
Aur zameen ki tarf kay kis tarah bechaei gai hay
Pus ap nasehat ker dia kerein (qk)ap sirf nasehat kerney waly hein
Ap kuch in per darogha nahi hein
Han jo shakhs rogardani kerty aur kufur kery
usy Allah Taalaa buhat bara azab dyga
be-shak hamari taraf inko lotna hay
Phir be-shak hamaray zimmay hay inn say hisab lena
Qasam hay fajar ki
Aur das raton ki
Aur juft aur taaq ki
Aur raat ki jab wo chalney lagy
Kiya inmein aqalmand kay wasty kafi qisam hay
Kiya ap ney nahi dekha ka yap kay rab nay Qom aad kay sath kiya kiya
Satoonon waly erum kay sath
Jis ki manind (koi qum) mulko mein paida nahi ki gai
Aur qum-e-samood kay sath jinho nay wadi mein bary bary pather trashy thy
Aur firoon kay sath jo meekhon wala tha
In sabhon nay shiron mein sir utha rakha tha
Aur bohat fasad macha rakha tha
Akhir tery rab nay in sab py azab ka kora barsaya
Yaqeenan tera rab ghat mein hay
Insan (ka yeh hal hay kay) jab ussy us ka rab azmata hay aur izat o neymat dyta hay to wo khyney lagta hay kay mery rab nay mujhy izat dar banadiya
aur jab wo usko azmata hay aur uski rozi tang kerdyta hay to wo kehney lagta hay kay mera rab nay meri ahanat ki hy(aur zalil kiya)
Aiaa herghiz nahi balkay (bat yeh hy) kay tum (hi)log yateemo ki izat nahi kerty
Aur miskino kay khilaney ki ik dosry ko targheeb nahi kerty
Aur (mardon ki)miras sameth sameth ker khaty ho
Aur maal ko ji bhar ker aziz rakhty ho
Yaqeenan jis waqat zameen koot koot ker baraber kerdi jaey gi
Aur tera rab(khud )ajaey ga aur farishty safen bandh ker(ajaey gay)
Aur jis din jhanum bhi lai jaey gi oss din insan ko samjh ayegi magar aj osky samjhney ka faida kahan
Wo kahy ga kay kash kay mein nay apni is zindagi kay liey kuch peshgi saman kiya hota
Pus aj Allah kay azab jaisa azab kisi ka na hoga
Na uski qaid o band jaisi kisi ki qaid o band hogi
Ay itmynan wali rooh
To apney rab ki taraf loot chal is tarah kay to issy razi wo tujh say khush
Pus mery khas bandon mein dakhil hoja
Aur meri jannat mein chali ja
